CN.content:

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

1. Corresponding open-circuit voltage (Voc)
2. Short-circuit current (Isc)
3. Fill factor (FF)
4. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)

So, the Material Name entities are not mentioned in the paragraph. The given entities are related to the devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

There are no Material Name entities mentioned in the paragraph. The paragraph only refers to the properties of devices (open-circuit voltage, short-circuit current, fill factor, and power conversion efficiency).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
